meanings.definition: Work assigned to be done outside of regular class time.
meanings.sent1: After school, I always have a lot of homeworks to finish.
meanings.sent2: Teachers give us homeworks to help us practice what we learned in class.
meanings.sent3: My dog thought my homeworks were a tasty snack!
meanings.sent4: The pile of homeworks on my desk felt like a mountain I had to climb.
meanings.sent5: Completing my homeworks felt like unlocking a secret code to understanding.

meanings.definition: A task or assignment given to students to be completed at home.
meanings.sent1: Every night, I sit down at my desk to tackle my homeworks.
meanings.sent2: My mom always checks to make sure I've completed all my homeworks.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left my homeworks at school and had to rush back to get them!
meanings.sent4: The weight of unfinished homeworks felt like a heavy burden on my shoulders.
meanings.sent5: Finishing my homeworks before dinner gave me a sense of accomplishment.
